description: A mask worn over your mouth which protects you from all kinds of environmental harm.
Nothing but rolls of newspaper, used as an improvised club. Although it is easy to create, it is pretty fragile.

A mask worn over your mouth and eyes, which protects you from all kinds of environmental harm. Plus, a little bit of night vison, flashlight, and thermal vision too! Powered by some nuclear-related battery, so you can use it as long as you want!

use_action.msg: Activating night vison.

description: A mask worn over your mouth and eyes, which protects you from all kinds of environmental harm. Plus, a little bit of night vison, flashlight, and thermal vision too! This thing is turned on, so night vision is activated.

use_action.msg: Activating flashlight.

description: A mask worn over your mouth and eyes, which protects you from all kinds of environmental harm. Plus, a little bit of night vison, flashlight, and thermal vision too! This thing is turned on, so flashlight mode is activated.

use_action.msg: Shutting down.

name: basic healing spray
description:
A medkit, released to civilians. Not the best option, but at least the healing activates instantly. 
 <color_yellow>Presented by Phoenix corp.</color>

name: medium healing spray
description:
A better medkit than the basic level medkit, released to civilians. Although it is not the best option and more expensive than the basic one, the healing activates instantly. 
 <color_yellow>Presented by Phoenix corp.</color>

name: advanced healing spray
description:
A medkit, only useable in the military. This is the best option and the healing activates instantly when applied. 
 <color_yellow>Presented by Phoenix corp.</color>

name: weird medikit
description:
Although this looks like another medikit, this is... quite weird. 
 <color_red>NOT</color> <color_yellow>presented by Phoenix corp.</color>

An improvised rifle, handcrafted from scrap.  Normally, they were used for hunting and self defence. Usually they use alcohol as an ignition, this one use a pneumatic system. Be careful where you reload it, pumping air into the tank takes a few seconds.  Pretty quiet, quite deadly, and it can use nails, marbles, and paintball as ammo.
An improvised rifle, handcrafted from scrap.  Slingshot is normally a toy, and does almost nothing against a zombie. However, this one is modified and much better. Easy to reload and powerful.
A professional-looking wool blazer.  Unlike the original, this one is easy to wear.
A white button-down shirt with long sleeves.
A short, breezy cotton skirt.  Unlike an ordinary skirt, this one has two pockets to store stuff.
A simple crimson bow tie.  Best worn with a high school uniform.
A simple crimson necktie.  Best worn with a high school uniform.
A pair of uniform pants.  Slightly warmer than jeans.
A plastic coat with a hood and two very large pockets.  Provides protection from rain. It also have a pair of frog eyes as a bonus!
School vigilantine, night study watch, principal's pet. Whatever you call it, this armband was a sign of some power back in the day.
A plastic ID card, wearing this will not give you any effects.
A plastic ID card, wearing this will not give you any effects.
A plastic ID card, wearing this will not give you any effects.
A jacket made from thick leather and cotton.  Cumbersome, but offers excellent protection from cuts and chilly weather.
A smooth and sturdy staff with a leather-wrapped grip. Normally this is used to control a band, it could be as a mace-like weapon if needed.
A sweatshirt with a hood and a "kangaroo pocket" in the front for storage. This one have an actual hood for you to put on.

use_action.msg: You took out your hood and covered your head with it.

description: A sweatshirt with a hood and a "kangaroo pocket" in the front for storage. This one have an actual hood for you to put on... and you did!

use_action.msg: You took off your hood from your head.

description: A red and fancy robe for a king, this one have dragons as a decoration.
A protective face mask made of thick plastic.  Commonly worn by hockey goalies. This one has a skull design, so it looks pretty cool.
A spiked helmet once worn by a marching band member. This hat is quite fancy, but that is it.
A white button-down shirt with long sleeves, for marching band members. It also has several golden buttons and ropes.
A short, breezy cotton skirt for marching band members.  Unlike an ordinary skirt, this one has two pockets to store stuff.
A pair of uniform pants for marching band members.  Slightly warmer than jeans.
A candy-apple-red fur and leather jacket, for marching band members. It also has several golden buttons and ropes, so it is quite fancy.
An umbrella, which is closed now. You can use this as an actual umbrella, if needed.

use_action.msg: You opened your umbrella, ready to shield yourself from rain.

description: An umbrella, which is opened now. You can use this as an improvised weapon, if needed.

use_action.msg: You closed your umbrella, ready to use it as an improvised weapon.

description: A mask which covers the whole head, and looks like a mixture of a motorcycle helmet and a boom box.

use_action.msg: Your HUD lights-up, and it is time to have some fun. Turn the music on!
Your HUD turns off.

description: A double shot pistol that loads two 12 gauge shotgun shells, handcrafted from scrap. You can fire it one by one, or you can fire both barrels at the same time.
A single shot pistol that loads 40mm grenades, handcrafted from scrap. Pocket sized ka-boom it is!
A thin and flat knife made for throwing.  Its ineffective cutting edge and odd shape makes it unsuitable for use as a tool. Plus, it is made from scrap, so it is quite unreliable.
A pink hair accessory with cute flower textures. This one has a spike, which could be a weapon if needed.
A telescoping selfie stick that collapses for easy storage.  Makes a mediocre melee weapon.  Activate to expand.

use_action.msg: You snap open your selfie stick.

description: A telescoping selfie stick that collapses for easy storage.  Makes a mediocre melee weapon.  Activate to collapse.

use_action.msg: You collapse your selfie stick.

description: A katana-shaped machete, which has a crimson red grip.

hit_you_effect.message: Your wounds regenerate as you chop %2$s down.
hit_you_effect.npc_message: %1$s's wounds disappear as they chop %2$s down.

description: A crappy laser machine gun, made with duct tape, lots of circuts, a steel drum, and hope.
A beautifully decorated blunderbuss pistol. Good old version of a 12 guage pistol.
A scrappy and bulky reproduction of the civil war era LeMat revolver, this one use the older paper cartridge ammo. Despite modern quality materials, the design is still rather delicate.
The flintlock Lemat revolver is unique in that its cylinder axis pin is also a fully functional blunderbuss barrel.  It's irremovable.

name: flintlock blunderbuss
description: A mixture of a flintlock, and a blunderbuss, and can shoot both rounds... Gods, an abomination! Who created this atrocity?

name: nock gun
description: A flintlock with seven barrels, so it is used as some kind of shotgun or a machine gun. Very powerful, but takes a lot of time to reload.
A single shot underbarrel gun that loads 12 gauge shotgun shells, handcrafted from scrap.
A leather strap worn on the hip for holding several, bit-larger-than-pistol sized guns.  Activate to holster/draw a gun.
A weird plant, which looks like it came from an 80s movie.
An oddly shpaed wood looking like a rifle, is called a gunstock due to its shape and useage of it. Was used by Native Americans. Also have a sharp point to pick some brains out.
A loose-fitting traditional Korean outfit, this one has some pink and white patterns on it.
A short, breezy cotton skirt.  Easy to move in and warm, but there is no pockets to store stuff.
A slow-loading hand weapon that launches three bolts.  Stronger people can reload it much faster.  Bolts fired from this weapon have a good chance of remaining intact for re-use.
A purple cotton jacket.  Good for brisk weather and light workout.
A pair of purple tracksuit pants.
A pair of purple tracksuit shorts.
A piece of suit which has five colors, and used in Korean traditional events.
Often used in Korean events, this one is quite fancy. Its wide brim helps keep the sun out of your eyes.

A popular, fancy smartphone.  Capable of making photos due to integrated camera and illuminating an area as per flashlight app. The smartphone also has a clock app that includes an alarm.  Runs on a small, infinite power cell.

use_action.msg: You activate the flashlight app.
You deactivate the flashlight app.

description: A megaphone, which has been modified to make loud noises... and damage stuff?
A rock tied to some kind of rope, you can use this in an emergency.
Made to spray some liquid, especially water, this thing is just a toy. What did you expect? You are not gonna use this... right?
Made to spray some water, this thing is not a toy, but a weapon. It freezes your enemies.

A mass of scrap metal crudely beat into shape, with folded rags underneath to protect the wearers knuckles.  A good, quick weapon - but you have to get within punching range to use it. An integrated tazer will make the job easier, by shocking the enemies. Activate to skock them.
Folded camp chair, now bound with duct tape to use it as a weapon.
A wooden sling bow, easy to use and accurate.  This one have some modification so that it can shoot arrows and bolts.
A modern slingshot with a wrist brace, it is easy to use, accurate, and quite powerful. This one have some modification so that it can shoot arrows and bolts.
Popular among children. More accurate than the original one, and easliy modifiable, but BBs deal nearly no damage.
A non-disintegrating cloth ammo belt which can hold up to 500 BBs.  Notably less reliable than metal ammo belts.
A red, black and fancy robe for a queen, this one have dragons as a decoration.
A colorful and heavy wig fit for a traditional asian woman. The wig have some space to store stuff.
A simple brass plated gong, this one emits a high noise.

player_descriptions: You play a little beat on your korean gong.
You play a beautiful rythm on your korean gong.
You play a piece on your korean gong that would sound harmonious with drums.

description: A simple yet quite fancy fabric covering tied over your forehead. Could be used as the lightest armor, if needed.
A white traditonal Korean shirt with blue vest as a decoration.
A pair of Korean traditional hanbok pants. Pretty comfy when you wear them.
The karambit is a small Indonesian curved knife resembling a claw. It is one of the weapons commonly used in pencak silat and Indonesian martial arts.
A slender long rod of plastic cudgel, while traditionally intended as a tool for controlling traffic and people, it still makes a good melee weapon in a pinch.

use_action.msg: You turn the light baton on.
You turn the light baton off.

description: A thin and flat spade card made for throwing.
A thin and flat club card made for throwing.
A thin and flat diamond card made for throwing.
A thin and flat heart card made for throwing.
A complex, wristwatch with lots of tools strapped on it, which made this looks like a gauntlet. You can do so many things with this!
A tool used to drive nails into wood or other material.  It could also be used as an ad-hoc weapon. This one is modified and can shoot nails in bursts.
This is a roman candle, packed in its storage form.  Use it to pop it out and make it ready to fire.  Once it is activated, it cannot be repacked.

use_action.msg: You unpacked your roman candle, ready to fire it if needed.

name: Roman candle
description: A Roman candle is a traditional type of firework that ejects one or more stars or exploding shells. It is only usable once, so you have to throw this away after you empty the cartridge.
An improvised... rifle? Well, you can use this as a long ranged weapon, but it is almost useless. You have been warned.
An improvised... pistol? Well, you can use this as a ranged weapon, but it is almost useless. You have been warned.
A skateboard is a type of sports equipment used for skateboarding.  Very fast on flat floors, but they make it hard to move on rough terrain, take hits, or to dodge effectively.

A skateboard is a type of sports equipment used for skateboarding.  Very fast on flat floors, but they make it hard to move on rough terrain, take hits, or to dodge effectively. This one is modified by... adding an engine?
A narrow plank used in surfing. Surfboards are relatively light, but are strong enough to support an individual standing on them while riding an ocean wave.
A plastic chunk filled with air in order to let people float in the water safely.
A high, black cap with a round top and two flat parts on the back of them. Traditionally worn by kings from various parts of Asia.
A one piece snowman suit used (headgear not included) by some event workers related to winter and christmas.
A snowman head for event workers, designed to provide comfort and warmth.
A black cotton jacket.  Good for brisk weather and light workout.
A pair of black tracksuit pants.
A light cloak meant to be thrown over your body.

//: Got this line of code and modified it from PK's rebalancing mod.
name: tactical shield
description: A ballistic shield designed to protect the approach of its holder and anybody standing behind them.  It is heavy and somewhat cumbersome, but its protection cannot be denied.  When activated it will be held close and in front of you.

use_action.msg: The tactical shield is pulled to a defensive posture!

name: tactical shield (def)
description: A ballistic shield designed to protect the approach of its holder and anybody standing behind them.  It is heavy and really cumbersome, but its protection cannot be denied.  It is currently being used, and slowing you down.

use_action.msg: The tactical shield is lowered.

name: zapper grenade
description: Zapper grenade is an improvised grenade which, when pin is pulled, emits a cloud of electricity which can shock your enemies; but be careful, it will also shock you if you are nearby.

name: armed zapper grenade
description: This zapper grenade currently lost its pin, thus creating a dangerous electric field.

name: radioactive grenade
description: Radioactive grenade is an improvised grenade which, when pin is pulled, emits a cloud of radiation which can damage your enemies; but be careful, it will also affect you if you are nearby.

name: armed radioactive grenade
description: This radioactive grenade currently lost its pin, thus creating a dangerous radioactive field.

name: cryo grenade
description: Cryo grenade is an improvised grenade which, when pin is pulled, emits a cloud of liquid nitrogen which can damage your enemies; but be careful, it will also affect you if you are nearby.

name: armed cryo grenade
description: This cryo grenade currently lost its pin, thus creating a dangerous cryo field.
A green apron made of thick leather.  Cumbersome, but offers excellent protection from cuts and dirt.
A cyan apron made of thick leather.  Cumbersome, but offers excellent protection from cuts and scraps of food.
A black apron made of thick leather.  Cumbersome, but offers excellent protection from cuts and paint splatter.
A plastic ham-looking item, marking the wearer as some kind of a gamer.
Actual... plant? Wearing this will give you no effects.

This is a typical household flashlight with a plastic handle.  Using this flashlight will turn it on and provide light, assuming it is charged with batteries. Since it is turned off, you can use this to crank your batteries.

use_action.msg: You turn the flashlight on.
You turn the flashlight off.

description: A single shot pistol that loads discs. Surprisingly, those discs does not just include normal frizbees, but more.
A model knife, made out of wood. Still a good weapon if needed, but will not last for long.
This is a digging tool. And a crowbar. And a saw. And more. Wow. Use it to dig pits, saw trees, and entry doors without permission.
Put a pickaxe head on a shovel. Now this is a digging tool. And a pickaxe. Wow. Use it to dig pits, break rocks, and entry doors without permission.
A smooth and sturdy staff with a leather-wrapped grip. This could be as a mace-like weapon if needed.
A small fabric bandolier for small items, which can be belt clipped, designed to be worn around the wrist.

name: injectable stimpak
description:
A syringe filled with powerful chemical stimulants which can only be activated by a Rivtech stimulant delivery system. 
 <color_yellow>Presented by Phoenix corp.</color>

name: injectable ampoule
description:
A syringe filled with advanced fast-healing chemicals which can only be activated by a Rivtech jet injector device.  A label on the side warns against using more than two doses per hour. 
 <color_yellow>Presented by Phoenix corp.</color>

name: injectable morphine
description:
A very strong semi-synthetic narcotic used to treat intense pain in hospital settings.  This injectable drug is very addictive. A label on the side warns against using more than two doses per hour. 
 <color_yellow>Presented by Phoenix corp.</color>

name: injectable AHF1-M
description:
A syringe filled with liquified antihemorrhagic compound that reacts with blood to immediately form a gel-like substance that stops bleeding. You do need to drink water after taking this medicine. 
 <color_yellow>Presented by Phoenix corp.</color>

name: injectable propital
description:
A very strong semi-synthetic narcotic used to treat intense pain in hospital settings.  This injectable drug is super addictive. A label on the side warns against using more than two doses per hour. This, an advanced(both in good and bad) version of morphine, could regenerate some of your health. 
 <color_yellow>Presented by Phoenix corp.</color>

name: injectable zagustin
description:
A military-issue drug. Inhibits activators of profibrinolysin and slows down its transformation in fibrinolysin. Stops the bleeding right after the drug use. Has side effects. Leads to severe dehydration. 
 <color_yellow>Presented by Phoenix corp.</color>

name: injector xPC-12 antidote
description:
Removes most of the known poisons and toxins used in the combat industry. Can be used to relieve the effects of natural poisons. 
 <color_yellow>Presented by Phoenix corp.</color>

use_action.activation_message: You shoot up, and remove the toxins in your body.

name: injector Combat stimulant SJ9 PCLabs
description:
Designed for special forces personnel. It makes it possible to make the human body invisible for a short time, significantly slowing down the metabolism. 
 <color_yellow>Presented by Phoenix corp.</color>

use_action.activation_message: You shoot up, making yourself invisible.

name: injectable L1
description:
A sterile disposable syringe with a dose of L1, based on morphine. It is used for short-term increase of strength and endurance, as well as to reduce the pain effect. This activates the implementation of a physiological response such as hit or run. Increases water and energy consumption. 
 <color_yellow>Presented by Phoenix corp.</color>

name: injectable Trimadol stimulant
description:
An opioid synthetic analgesic developed for special forces operatives. It has a central and spinal cord action. In addition to the analgesic effect, it increases the user's speed. 
 <color_yellow>Presented by Phoenix corp.</color>

name: injectable Perfotoran
description:
A blood substitute with the function of oxygen transfer, used as a powerful antidote capable of relieving toxins, poisons, and radiation damage. It temporarily speeds up the metabolism and regenerates tissues. Negatively affects health. 
 <color_yellow>Presented by Phoenix corp.</color>

use_action.activation_message: You shoot up, and remove the toxins and radiation in your body.

name: injectable PNB (Product 16) stimulant
description:
Developed by Pheonix Corp Labs, labeled PNB. Allows a short-term activation of increased strength, and at the same time there's some chemicals for accelerated tissue regeneration. 
 <color_yellow>Presented by Phoenix corp.</color>

name: injectable P22 (Product 22) stimulant
description:
This allows the tissues of the body for accelerated tissue regeneration and better health. 
 <color_yellow>Presented by Phoenix corp.</color>

name: injectable Meldonin
description:
This allows conducting more intensive training and recovering stamina faster. Temporarily increases strength, and speed. Has side effects. 
 <color_yellow>Presented by Phoenix corp.</color>

name: injectable SJ1 PCLabs combat stimulant
description:
Using this allows the user to gain strength and forget pain before combat. Decreases sensation of pain. 
 <color_yellow>Presented by Phoenix corp.</color>

name: injectable SJ6 PCLabs combat stimulant
description:
Using this allows the user to increase the body abilities before combat. Developed by Phoenix corp Labs, marked as SJ6. 
 <color_yellow>Presented by Phoenix corp.</color>

name: injectable 3-(b-TG) stimulant
description:
Using this allows the user to increase the body abilities before combat. Developed by Phoenix corp Labs, marked as SJ6. 
 <color_yellow>Presented by Phoenix corp.</color>

name: injectable Ud-R153 stimulant
description:
Using this allows the user to hide one's scent from the undead, marked as Ud-R153. 
 <color_yellow>Presented by Phoenix corp.</color>

A very large cardboard box, the sort children would have loved to hide in, when there were still children. Now you can also hide in it. 

...

Snake? Snake? Snaaaaaaaake!
A soft cotton hat.  Commonly worn by navy forces and sea cadet corps.
A white shirt with short sleeves and a black scarf, for sea cadet corps.
A pair of white shorts.  Comfortable and light.
Popular among children. More accurate than the original one, and easliy modifiable, but BBs deal nearly no damage.
This is a long, thin object, usually made of wood, for writing or drawing, with a sharp black point at one end.
A weird watch, which could be used for stunning people and zombies. Works well with a indigo colored blazer and a bow tie.
A remote control for both RC cars and robots.
This is a compact and lightweight shaving and haircut kit made for travelers.  You can use it to shave or get your hair trimmed.
This is a compact and lightweight shaving and hygiene kit made for travelers.  You can use it to shave, get your hair trimmed, or wash things up.
A simple wooden whistle, with a cord to wear it around your neck.
A plain hairpin to keep your hair in place.

A slow-loading hand weapon that launches bolts.  Stronger people can reload it much faster.  Bolts fired from this weapon have a good chance of remaining intact for re-use. This one had been modified to give some extra heat damage.
A cleverly designed all-in-one tool which combines several smaller tools into the handles of a pair of pliers.
Whether you are cleaning zoos, feeding some animals, or fighting some undead, this is the hat for the job.
Useful for carrying medical items, documents, or first aid kits.

name: rechargeable medikit
description:
A modification of a medium medkit, released to civilians. Although it is not the best option and more expensive than the basic one, the healing activates instantly. This one has been modified to use batteries. 
 <color_yellow>Presented by Phoenix corp.</color>
A wooden blowgun, it isn't hard to use, and is very accurate. Darts are used as ammunition.
A steel pen gun, it isn't hard to use, and is very accurate. Darts are used as ammunition. Do not expect a lot of damage.
This is a plastic bottle filled with cola and a candy.  Use this item to activate, which gives you six seconds to get away from it before it detonates.

use_action.msg: You activate the cola bomb.

description: This cola bomb's fuse is lit, and it will explode any second now.  Throw it immediately!

use_action.no_deactivate_msg: You've already lit the %s, try throwing it instead.

description: This is a printed guide to every trail, road, and buildings.

use_action.message: You add trails and trailheads to your map.

description: An insulated, breathable hoodie made for alpine skiing.  Very warm, and with sizable pockets.
This is a modified fire extinguisher, packed in its storage form.  Use it to pop it out and make it ready to fire.  Once it is activated, it cannot be repacked.

use_action.msg: You unpacked your fire extinguisher, ready to fire it if needed.

description: A fire extinguisher, which has been modified to make smoke cover... and damage stuff?

use_action.msg: You re-grab your crap trench knife, to use it as a knuckleduster.
You re-grab your scrap trench knife, to use it as a knife.

description: Also known as a "bigpack", this rucksack is prized by pack rats but may lead to a bad back. Made from a body bag and some cordage.

This is an inactive, and modified manhack.  Manhacks are fist-sized robots that fly through the air. This one has been modified to release healing gas, taze others, and shoot laser guns. Use this item to activate Enz.  Electronics and computer skill determines if the drone is activated successfully.

use_action.friendly_msg: The Enz flies from your hand and surveys the area!

description: A broken Enz.  Much less threatening now that it lies limp on solid ground.  Could be gutted for parts.

This is an inactive, and modified manhack.  Manhacks are fist-sized robots that fly through the air. This one has been modified to taze others, and shoot laser guns. Use this item to activate attack drone.  Electronics and computer skill determines if the drone is activated successfully.

use_action.friendly_msg: The attack drone flies from your hand and surveys the area!
use_action.hostile_msg: You misprogram the attack drone; it's hostile!

description: A broken attack drone.  Much less threatening now that it lies limp on solid ground.  Could be gutted for parts.
A half gas mask, or respirator, that covers the face and eyes.  Provides excellent protection from smoke and other contaminants.  It must be prepared before use.
A tough jacket with lots of pockets.  Favored by the school security.
A tough pair of pants lined with pockets.  Favored by the school security.
A short, breezy cotton skirt.  Unlike an ordinary skirt, this one has two pockets to store stuff.
This simple IED is designed to be thrown and detonate on impact. Warning: Do not 'a'ctivate it, since it will blow yourself off.

use_action.no_deactivate_msg: You tried to activate this. It will blow up in your inventory soon.

name: heal gas grenade
description: Heal gas grenade is an improvised grenade which, when pin is pulled, emits a cloud of healing gas which can heal your allies; but be careful, it will also heal your enemies if they are nearby.

name: armed heal gas grenade
description: This heal gas grenade currently lost its pin, thus creating a soothing healing field.
A cheap copy of an old shotgun, possibly antique. It is little more than a pair of barrels, a wood stock, and a hammer to strike the cartridges.
A home-made shotgun.  It is simply a pipe attached to a stock, with a hammer to strike the single round it holds. Easliy craftable, but easliy breakable.
A leather glove, easy to use and accurate.  It helps the user to throw rocks and pebbles as ammunition.
A snug-fitting cotton hat.  Quite warm and perfect for holidays.
An improvised, huge, and direct launcher for rocks.  Essentially, a thick-walled steel pipe, equipped with a rubber band.  Effective only at medium range, barely.
Just a narrow wooden barrel cut in half. By adding this to a bow, you can shoot bolts instead of arrows. Adds damage, but hard to aim accurately.
This is a military combat axe.  It is light and extremely sharp, and could be deadly in either the right hands or when attached as an axe bayonet.
A makeshift bag, cobbled together from rags. Provides a decent amount of storage.
A makeshift bag, cobbled together from rags. Provides a decent amount of storage.
Popular among children. More accurate than the original one, and easliy modifiable, but BBs deal nearly no damage.
